amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part D of House Report 118-705 to add consideration of a strategy for reducing the threat of wildfires to wildland firefighters to the fireshed assessment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
